alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:54PM EST until February 23 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 383.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Sunday was 383.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 383.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 383.1 feet on 01/25/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
